topics.body: "Silly God, planting reef fossils to confuse scientists.":http://www.science20.com/news_articles/cloudina_animals_were_building_reefs_550_million_years_ago-139463
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
*As our anti-heroes fight for no apparent reason in front of Derpibooru, the skies turn dark, flares of burning wind pierce from above, large typhoons and tornadoes shred the mountains and blue lighting clashed with each other, fighting for supremacy to reach their goal, the cold dirt ground of Terra.*

*Indeed, a glorious it was and still is, as the narrator just sits on a Nimbus cloud, sipping on tea and eating crumpets with a microphone next to him that controls the very essence of the Universe. They looked at me from below, wondering what that voice is. All I could say was "Yo."*
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
*The Monster's getting away*

*They finish it off with a rider kick*

Trashboat: Now for this other one!

Number1pegasus: Yes!

*I revert back to myself*

*The Cyclone Gaia memory disappears*

*I take out another Gaia memory*

@Heat!@

*Another Gaia memory appears in another slot of the belt*

*I secure the Heat Gaia memory*

@Heat! Metal!@

!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140328132431/kamenrider/images/thumb/a/ae/HeetuMetaru.png/180px-HeetuMetaru.png!

*Follows on our Bike*

*Sadly, the young drake had forgotten who the narrator was and as narrator, I controlled everything including breaking the laws of physics, biology and chemistry. The blue balls of fire were quickly put out and instead, the randomly generated dinosaur turned into a _baby_ random generated dinosaur.*

*It was a glorious moment.*

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ae61ab63687257cee30400#post_53ae61ab63687257cee30400
" "Kamen Rider begins to wonder to himself why there was a voice in my head dictating everything I did and thought he thought.  Now the voice was describing itself being considered by Kamen Rider who found it particularly strange.  I'm dreaming about a voice describing me thinking about how it's describing my thoughts he thought.

He would prove it!  He would prove that it was a dream so he closed his eyes and invited himself to wake up. 'Let me wake up! I'm through with this dream!  Please it's all I want.  All I want is my life exactly as I remember it.  I am okay.  Kamen Rider began screaming, 'I am Kamen Rider; I have a team!  I have a hensin!  I am real!  Please someone tell me I'm real!  Who am I?! Who am I?!":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c3raVsi_0iM "
(link if you don't get the reference)
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
